services.title: Our services
services.description: Full range of logistics services for your business

autoTransport.title: Road Transport
autoTransport.description: We organize international road transport from China to Russia, Kazakhstan and Europe. We work with both full truckload (FTL) and less than truckload (LTL) shipments. We have our own network of verified carriers and a reliable tracking system.

railwayTransport.title: Rail Transport
railwayTransport.description: Direct container trains from China to Russia and CIS countries. Possibility of sending both full container loads (FCL) and less than container loads (LCL). Fast delivery times and competitive rates.

multimodalTransport.title: Multimodal Transport
multimodalTransport.description: Combination of sea, road, and rail transport. Optimal solution for price and delivery times. We select a route tailored to the client's task.

projectTransport.title: Project Cargo Transport
projectTransport.description: Delivery of oversized and heavy cargo. Route development, organization of special equipment, and coordination. Experience in transporting equipment for construction and energy.

air.title: Air Transportation
air.description: Fast delivery of cargo by air transport

sea.title: Sea Transportation
sea.description: Cost-effective cargo delivery by sea transport

land.title: Land Transportation
land.description: Flexible cargo delivery by road and rail transport

multimodal.title: Multimodal Transportation
multimodal.description: Combined transportation using multiple transport modes

auto.title: Road transportation
auto.description: International road shipments from China to Russia, Kazakhstan and Europe. Full truckload (FTL) and less-than-truckload (LTL). Own network of verified carriers and reliable tracking.

rail.title: Rail transportation
rail.description: Direct container trains from China to Russia and CIS. Both full containers (FCL) and consolidated cargo (LCL). Fast transit and competitive rates.

multimodal.title: Multimodal transportation
multimodal.description: Combination of sea, road and rail. Optimal solution for price and delivery time. Route tailored to the task.

project.title: Project cargo
project.description: Delivery of oversized and heavy cargo. Route engineering, special equipment and permits. Experience with construction and energy equipment.
